name: Luger's Prison Palace
description:
Luger Huntress came home to a sieged kingdom and found out that his sister was taken to another palace beyond the boundaries of Eastern Monoterra. There, he ended up being imprisoned by immaterial chains binding him to stay. All he knew was that he needed to get his sister back from the kingdom of heathens, but things went subtlely out of control.

House Greavel, where his sister Lotti will be married into, was under attack by multiple forces to prevent them from continuing their hold on the crown. With his sister's life put in the line as well as his kingdom, Luger ended up being a resident of Gwendolyn as long as he must in order to protect what are his.

However, fate started playing games on him as the people of Gwendolyn Palace started growing on him. Knowing their own stories and endeavors wake up the hero inside Luger once again. He was torn between helping everyone who needed him or to be selfish enough to fight against House Greavel in a state of war. Not to mention that the gods started something in the East.

Play as Luger Huntress as he endured the temptations of being the hero they needed or the brother Lotti wanted him to be.

Gameplay:

Luger's Prison Palace is a hybrid kinetic visual novel. Your choices of conversations to make might affect the flow of the story. Though not all choices lead to a 'Dead End', pay extra attention to Luger's supposed orders to avoid pitfalls during the game.

Current Version (1.2):

  • Play up to twelve (12) chapters of the game.
  • You can get at most four (4) alternate endings before unlocking the last available part of the game.
  • Rollbacks are enabled at any part of the game.

Upcoming Updates (Coming Soon):

  • Music tracks will be included.
  • Bonus Mini-story: The Knight of Ruin (paid content).
  • Current effects will be enhanced.
